formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: WaitEvent Synopsis: Wait for an event to occur Privilege: <none> Description: A 'WaitEvent' action will ellicit a 'Success' response. Whenever a manager event is queued. Once WaitEvent has been called on an HTTP manager session, events will be generated and queued. Variables: Timeout: Maximum time to wait for events

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -5,4 +5,4 @@ a manager event is queued. Once WaitEvent has been called on an HTTP manager session, events will be generated and queued. Variables: - Timeout: Maximum time to wait for events + Timeout: Maximum time (in seconds) to wait for events, -1 means forever.
